page.title: 12MAIN FEATURES OF SAMBOURNE
page.content:
One main feature of Sambourne is the village green. In the centre of the green a tree is placed which has seats around it. In summer it is a pleasant place to sit.
On the outskirts is a factory which produces soft drinks. They are made in sachets which should be frozen before consumption and sold in summer. In winter they produce candy apples and toffee apples. Many toffee apples are sold for bonfire night. Approximately 30 people work here. The company, which started in 1974, makes half a million sachets a week.
The factory is located at Oak Farm, Gill Lane, Sambourne.
